pokeball.name: Pokeball
pokeball.description: A basic Pokeball for catching Pokemon

greatball.name: Great Ball
greatball.description: A better Pokeball with improved catch rate

ultraball.name: Ultra Ball
ultraball.description: The best Pokeball with highest catch rate

masterball.name: Master Ball
masterball.description: A special Pokeball that never fails

razzberry.name: Razz Berry
razzberry.description: A berry that makes Pokemon easier to catch

goldenrazzberry.name: Golden Razz Berry
goldenrazzberry.description: A rare berry that greatly improves catch rate

silverpinapberry.name: Silver Pinap Berry
silverpinapberry.description: A berry that improves catch rate and gives extra candy

revive.name: Revive
revive.description: Revives a fainted Pokemon with 50% HP

rarecandy.name: Rare Candy
rarecandy.description: A special candy that can power up any Pokemon

stardust.name: Stardust
stardust.description: A special dust used to power up Pokemon
